page.title: 03RECREATION
page.content: Eckford and Crailing have village halls which are used for various sports and entertainments. Clubs:Eckford has a youth club for ages 10-16. Games played include table tennis, darts, pool. Both villages have Scottish Womans Rurals which meet monthly Entertainments:Eckford Rural have an all woman Drama Group which perform one act plays locally. An annual concert and village dances are held. Sport;Eckford has junior and senior Badminton Clubs. Crailing has a Carpet Bowling Club, Eckford also has a Yoga/ Keep Fit Class.People also travel to Jedburgh and Kelso for Tennis, Rugby, Football, Swimming, Curling, Skating and Squash.
